quote: I began to think vodka was my drink at last. It didn’t taste like anything, but it went straight down into my stomach like a sword swallowers’ sword and made me feel powerful and godlike.
quote_letters: I BEGAN TO THINK VODKA WAS MY DRINK AT LAST IT DIDNT TASTE LIKE ANYTHING BUT IT WENT STRAIGHT DOWN INTO MY STOMACH LIKE A SWORD SWALLOWERS SWORD AND MADE ME FEEL POWERFUL AND GODLIKE
